properties.query:
// Sudden spike in inbound RDP
SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4624 and LogonType == 10
| summarize Count=count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h), TargetAccount, Computer
| join kind=leftouter (
    SecurityEvent
    | where EventID == 4625 and LogonType == 10
    | summarize Failures=count() by bin(TimeGenerated,1h), Computer
) on Computer, TimeGenerated
| order by Count desc
